title: #482 Backyard Blues with Steve Rannazzisi and Nick Youssef
itunes:title: Backyard Blues with Steve Rannazzisi and Nick Youssef
description:
Nick Youssef and I went over to Steve Rannazzisi's new house to hang out by the pool and eat our weight in BBQ. We were going to talk about tough breakups in the pool but the day was so nice it got away from us, so we decided to shoot the shit at sunset and talk about Nick's upcoming special instead. Man how nice it would be to have a backyard like Steve's. Check it out on youtube.com/AriShaffir.

For More Ari:

Subscribe on YouTube 

Instagram - @arishaffir 

Patreon 

Cool merch & more

 

For more Nick Youssef:

Nick is recording his first comedy special! 

Help make it happen here: https://bit.ly/nick_special 

Get tickets to the live taping on 9/27 in NYC: https://bit.ly/nickyoussef-taping 

 

Nick’s podcast: According to Nick Youssef

Instagram: @nickyoussef 

Twitter: @NickYoussef 

Patreon 

 

For more Steve Rannazzisi: 

Get tickets to see Steve October 13-15 at PunchLine San Francisco: https://bit.ly/rannazzisi-tix 

Check out Steve’s podcast: ‘What's the Odds?’

Follow on Instagram: @steverannazzisi & @whatstheoddspod

 

The Music:

Sopranos Theme

Backyard Party - R. Kelly

Steve- I Am Steve

Our House - Crosby Stills and Nash


Thank you to our sponsors, 3Chi.com use code "Ari" for 5% off your order and check out YoKratom.com home of the $60 Kilo!
